definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: If left untreated, fistula can cause other health problems.
sentences.chinese: 如果不及時治療，瘻管可能導致其他健康問題。

sentences.english: Fistulas, the internal ruptures that can lead to lifelong incontinence.
sentences.chinese: 瘻管的內部破裂可能會引起終身的大小便失禁。

sentences.english: Infection of preauricular fistula was noticed especially in patients below 30 years of age.
sentences.chinese: 耳前瘻管患者感染好發於30歲以下。

sentences.english: Arterioportal fistulas (APFs) are rare vascular disorders of the mesenteric circulation.
sentences.chinese: 動脈門靜脈瘻管是一種少見的疾病。

sentences.english: Objective: To study efficacy ofinfliximab treatment for Crohn's disease fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討英夫利昔治療克羅恩病瘻管的近期療效。

sentences.english: Objective To seek the effective prevention and nursing measures against gastrostomy gavage complications.
sentences.chinese: 目的尋找胃造瘻管飼併發症有效的預防及護理措施。

sentences.english: Other surgical procedures include the treatment of abscesses and fistulas .
sentences.chinese: 其他外科手術治療包括膿腫和瘻管。

sentences.english: Mr. Charles, can I examine your dialysis fistula?
sentences.chinese: 查理先生，我能檢查你的洗腎瘻管嗎？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of fistula irrigating therapy on abscess complicated from congenital pre-auricular fistula infection.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察經瘻管口沖洗治療耳前瘻管膿腫的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of fistula irrigating therapy on abscess complicated from congenital pre-auricular fistula infection.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察經瘻管口沖洗治療耳前瘻管膿腫的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the significance of dissection of the facial nerve in resection of the first branchial fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討面神經解剖在第一鰓裂瘻管切除術中的意義。

sentences.english: The thorough excision focus of infection is early treats in front of the ear the syrinx good method of treatment.
sentences.chinese: 及早徹底切除病竈是治療耳前瘻管較佳治療方法。

sentences.english: Enteric anastomoses may disrupt and produce a fistula and peritonitis.
sentences.chinese: 小腸吻合可能破裂併產生瘻管和腹膜炎。

sentences.english: We report a rare complication of syrinx formation resulting from a CEI.
sentences.chinese: 我們在此報道一例罕見的由CEI所致的瘻管形成。

sentences.english: Congenital preauricular fistula is a common abnormality consequent on deficiency of embryonal development.
sentences.chinese: 先天性耳前瘻管由胚胎髮育異常引起。

sentences.english: To explore the therapeutic effect of the Trichiasis electrolyzer on congenital lacrimal fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討電解倒睫器對先天性淚囊瘻管的治療作用。
